column5: Can anyone recommend a storage facility for a boat/trailer in this area. Haven't decided yet whether to go with a heated facility or otherwise.  Thanks in advance.

Any farms out your way huey ??  Alot of farmers rent out their barns for winter storage and it's a LOT cheaper than those regular storage facilities. My boat spends the winter months in this barn and  the total price for the ENTIRE winter is only $150  As long as the boat is properly winterized, there's no need for the extra expense of a heated storage facility either.
That's a great idea. I'll have to have a look up on the escarpment.  Thanks!
